title: Unwed elderly couple fought over $1.5m in joint account after break-up
title_page: Unwed elderly couple fought over $1.5m in joint account after break-up | The Straits Times
maintext:
The course of true love never did run smooth, said William Shakespeare, but the 50-year romance of an unmarried couple in Singapore almost did â€“ until the former lovebirds fought tooth and nail in the High Court over their $1.5 million life savings.
Their last tango had all the drama of a Shakespearean play, given the swings and roundabouts the relationship had endured over the years.
